roles.title: Vendor
roles.goal: Drive adoption and retention through differentiated platforms.
roles.value: Funds enablement, sets guardrails, and creates co-sell leverage.
roles.signal: Shipping roadmaps with built-in partner economics.

roles.title: Distributor / Aggregator
roles.goal: Remove friction for thousands of partners at once.
roles.value: Provides credit, billing, logistics, and data services.
roles.signal: Orchestrates multi-vendor bundles with clean incentives.

roles.title: MSP / Partner
roles.goal: Translate technology into accountable business outcomes.
roles.value: Designs, implements, and operates ongoing managed services.
roles.signal: Owns the customer relationship end to end.

roles.title: Marketplace
roles.goal: Enable self-service buying with trusted partner services attached.
roles.value: Offers digital commerce, metering, and private offers.
roles.signal: Connects listings, partners, and billing in one flow.

roles.title: ISV / Add-on
roles.goal: Extend core platforms with specialized capabilities.
roles.value: Closes gaps with integrations that deliver measurable ROI.
roles.signal: Ships certified integrations and partner playbooks.
